fields.description: Este luminoso piso de época junto a Gran Vía es ideal para viajes de trabajo o vacaciones en familia. Con 6 balcones a dos calles, 5 dormitorios, 5 baños, cocinas equipadas y una exquisita decoración, La Casa de Luna es un lugar único en Madrid. LA CASA DE LUNA es un espacio de aproximadamente 180 m2, cuya distribución permite compartir momentos personales o de trabajo, dependiendo del tipo de viaje del huésped. A la vez tiene una gran privacidad, ya que cada una de las zonas que se describe a continuación tiene su propia puerta de seguridad con llave. La distribución es: MOON - Decoración "Chic" con mucha clase y piezas únicas. - Gran salón con 2 balcones, chimenea, confortable sofá de tres metros lineales con cama doble oculta fácilmente convertible.  - Dormitorio principal con 1 balcón, 2 camas de 90 x 200 cm (que pueden convertirse en cama king size de 180 x 200 cm), vestidor con gran capacidad de almacenaje,  sala de baño con bañera spa y ducha de hidromasaje. - Dormitorio doble c

Después de las 20h: Se cobrará 1 noche extra.  - Cuna:  Hasta 10 huéspedes (incluído el bebe) solo un fijo de 25 euros. Todos los transportes públicos están a tu alcance: - METRO: Puedes elegir entre varias estaciones, depende de tu destino: Santo Domingo y Noviciado (Línea 2), Callao (Línea 5), Gran Vía (Línea 1). (URL HIDDEN) - TREN: La Estación de Atocha y Príncipe Pío son las estaciones más cercanas. Conectan con Luna a través del Metro.  - AUTOBUSES: Todos los buses turísticos con vista panorámica pasan por Gran Vía. Además, más de 6 líneas pasan por calles cercanas. Consultar en (URL HIDDEN)

fields.name: GRAN VIA LA CASA DE LUNA
fields.neighborhood_overview: Junto a Gran Vía, LA CASA DE LUNA está localizada en el punto perfecto para iniciar la visita al Madrid monumental, gastronómico, cultural y nocturno. Quieres descubrirlo?  - VISITA MONUMENTAL: Luna es un excelente punto de partida para visitar el Madrid de los Austrias, la plaza Mayor, la zona de Opera con el Palacio de Oriente, El Retiro... - MUSEOS: Bajando hacia Cibeles por la Gran Vía llegamos al Paseo del Prado, con la mejor oferta de Museos de la Ciudad: Museo Thysen, El Prado, Reina Sofía y Caixa Forum son los principales. - QUE HACER: La Casa de Luna está en pleno "soho" madrileño, un barrio con una intensa vida cultural. Teatros, cines, salas de exposiciones, centros de canto, danza, talleres de pintura, salas de conciertos, editoriales, librerías, talleres artesanales, escuelas y centros de diseño... Simplemente paseando te tropezarás con todo un abanico de posibilidades. - DONDE COMER: La zona presenta una rica y variada oferta gastronómica nacional e internacional. Aquí ti
fields.notes: - LA CASA DE LUNA dispone de línea de teléfono fija para llamadas GRATUITAS a fijos locales y nacionales. Recibe tus llamadas sin pagar roaming. - Tenemos Internet wifi por fibra óptica en toda la casa. - Hay dos laundrys con tabla, plancha, lavadora y secadora, donde encontrará artículos de limpieza como jabón y suavizante para lavadora, lejía, pastillas para el lavaplatos,etc que puede utilizar GRATIS en la casa.  - Hay 4 secadores de pelo y expendedores de jabón con gel en cada baño. - Se ofrece servicio opcional de limpieza, cambio de sábanas y toallas durante la estancia. Pedir presupuesto. - Hay 2 extintores: En el vestidor de Moon y en el vestíbulo de entrada. - Varios: Hay costurero y botiquín para heridas/dolores leves en el aparador de la entrada. - Hay 7 aparatos de aire acondicionado frío/calor con mando a distancia en soporte mural detrás de las puertas. - Hay 5 televisores Led, dos de ellos son Smart TV con 50 pulgadas. - Hay 2 chimeneas de bioalcohol. Hay que firmar docu
fields.amenities: TV,Internet,Wireless Internet,Air conditioning,Kitchen,Smoking allowed,Elevator in building,Indoor fireplace,Family/kid friendly,Washer,Dryer,First aid kit,Fire extinguisher,Essentials
fields.interaction: - Les recibiremos en el check-in y presentaremos el apartamento. Les enseñaremos a cerrar balcones y ventanas con seguridad. - Les mostraremos como utilizar la lavadora, secadora, lavaplatos, cafetera express y cualquier otro electrodoméstico que usted necesite. - Pueden contactar con nosotros para cualquier consulta a través del email o por teléfono. - Todos nuestros colchones y almohadas son antialérgicos, tratados bacteriológicamente contra ácaros. - Las cocinas tienen extractores con filtros de carbono para purificar el aire y eliminar olores.
fields.host_about:
Somos positivos, vitalistas y nuestra finalidad es ser felices.
Procuramos dar armonía a nuestras decoraciones, que tengan vida y no resulten frías, que se integren con el entorno.
Nuestro sueño es conocer el mundo. Por eso respetamos mucho a los viajeros y procuramos tratarles como nos gustaría que lo hicieran con nosotros.
Nos encanta recibir invitados y que se sientan como en su propia casa.

fields.description: Alquilo habitación en ático muy soleado con terraza y vistas a la Sagrada Familia. En el piso solo vivo yo, un chico de 33 años y trabajo fuera de Barcelona, con lo que podréis disfrutar del piso entero la mayor parte del tiempo. Ven y disfruta de tus estancia en Barcelona des de un atico muy soleado y sus vistas a la Sagrada Familia.  Siéntete como en casa! Podrás hacer uso de todo el piso y todos sus complementos. Lava tu ropa, consulta internet, cocina, o toma el sol en la terraza. El barrio de la Sagrada Familia es un barrio de visita obligada. Disfruta del monumento más representativo de Gaudí des de unas vistas impresionantes.  También es un barrio muy popular entre los barceloneses y lleno de vida de barrio. Tienes un mercado al lado y muchos restaurantes y locales de toda la vida. En Sagrada Familia pasan 2 lineas de metro, L5 (azul), y la L2 (lila) con la que podrás llegar al centro de la ciudad en 3 paradas.

fields.house_rules: INFORMACION STAR:  - STAR es uno de los 4 apartamentos de LA CASA DE LUNA, es un estudio con cocina y baño. - Estamos en la Calle Luna 11 piso 1º derecha.  - El metro más cercano es Callao (Línea 5). También queda cerca Gran Vía (línea 1) , Noviciado y Santo Domingo (línea 2).  - Se permite fumar solamente fuera del apartamento, en los BALCONES.  - Prohibido hacer fiestas, beber alcohol en exceso, consumir drogas dentro del apartamento, poner música alta, gritar en la escalera o en el portal,  y cualquier comportamiento indebido que pueda molestar a los vecinos. El propietario se reserva el derecho de llamar a la policía en caso de escándalo y queja de los vecinos. El incumplimiento de estas normas podrá derivar en el desalojo de los huéspedes y cancelación de la reserva sin devolución de dinero alguno. - No se permiten mascotas.  - Hay ascensor en el edificio pero es muy antiguo y da problemas, por ello no se permite el uso para los viajeros. Estamos en el primer piso y hay muy pocos
fields.description: Apartment for 4 people  - Living room with sofa bed (2 beds) and balcony.  - Bar with 4 stools and kitchen table.  - Bedroom with 1 balcony and double bed (140 x 200 cm) with 4 storage drawers.  - 2 closets.  - Bathroom with shower.  - Kitchen with everything you need for cooking.  - Appliances: Induction hob, microwave, fridge, extractor, juicer, toaster, iron, hair dryer.  - Laundry shared with Iron, ironing, washing machine and dryer.
fields.summary: Apartamento para 4 Personas
fields.access: Servicios STAR/LA CASA DE LUNA (opcional):   - Parking en Garage Luna: Precio especial para clientes 18€ por día (vehículos grandes tipo van, todoterrenos o furgonetas 24€). - Late check-in: 30€ para llegadas posteriores 20h. 50€ para llegadas posteriores 23h. - Late check-out: Si hay disponibilidad ofrecemos 2 horas de cortesía gratis hasta 12h,  50€ hasta 16h o 100€ hasta 20h. Después de las 20h: Se cobrará 1 noche extra.   - Cuna: Tarifa plana 20 euros hasta 5 personas. A partir de 6 huéspedes adultos, la cuna cuesta 10 euros por noche. - Si desea limpieza extra durante su estancia, por favor, solicítelo antes de su viaje. El coste es 15 euros/hora con un mínimo de 4 horas.  - Si desea cambio extra de toallas: 2 € cada unidad.  - Si desea cambio extra de sábanas: 8 € cada set de cama (funda nórdica o sábana encimera + sábana bajera + fundas almohada) - Si desea cambio extra de sábanas: 8 € cada set de cama (funda nórdica o sábana encimera + sábana bajera + fundas almohada)

fields.transit: The area Les Corts is a 15 minute metro ride from the centre of town and is well serviced by both Les Corts and Plaça Del Centro metro stops which are both on the green line, and the Estacio Sants train station. The Sants station is a short walk from Les Corts and has direct trains to the Airport, and other popular destinations such as Sitges on the coast. Also, from plaça Espanya, you can get transport direct to Monserrat. Car : You are able to park during days in street but it is not for free, however during nights is easier to find places to park. Also you can find many parking with a cost between 18-20 € daily.

fields.name: Quite room near Camp Nou&UPC
fields.neighborhood_overview: In our neighbour (Les corts), there are bars a plenty and even some clubs. If clubbing isn't your thing be sure to have a wander round and try out some of the lovely tapas places on every corner. Also of interest is the Barcelona Football club's grounds Camp Nou. Camp Nou is in Les Corts and is a must-see for any football enthusiast. Tours around the grounds and the museum are available. If you like to practice sport, you can find a big sport complex and a huge swimming pool close to the apartment. Also, for running Diagonal boulevards is one of the recommended places. The UPC and some Faculties of UB are 20 minutes walking. The beautiful Plaça Espanya is a 15 minute walk away from Les Corts area, and there you can enjoy the entertainment that Montjuïc has to offer. If you like a good walk you can even walk into the historic, leafy area called Eixample in about half an hour, or the centre of town in about an hour. Les Corts is an important financial business district in Barcelona. Also
fields.notes: We would ask you to be clean in your staying time in our place and don't make a lot of noise and be respective with the neighborhood. There is a famous gym exactly next to the apartment which you can take advantage a lot of its facilities such as pool, jacuzzi ,...

fields.description: Private room with ensuite bathroom in a 18th century building. One of the finest neighborhoods of the city center: very quiet, "tourist free" area :) 200mt away from the beach 100mt away from the Airbus stop 400mt away from the cathedral The whole apartment is very bright and room has a lovely balcony on famous seminary square with a fountain that sprinkles water producing a very relaxing sound. Bus stops to airport, harbor, train station, and most important locations are just 100mt away.  Anything else in the city center is at walking distance.

fields.host_about:
Hi there!
What to say about me... I'm a quiet, tidy, smiling person who likes light, space, and beauty. That's why I ended up in Palma I guess :)
No pets, no cigarettes....Only 2 rules: kindness and respect.
That's pretty much as concentrated as I can make it here :)
Cheers!

fields.house_rules: - Se permite fumar solamente en los BALCONES del salón Star. Dentro no está permitido el cigarrillo. - Prohibido hacer fiestas, beber alcohol en exceso, consumir drogas dentro del apartamento, poner música alta, gritar en la escalera o en el portal,  y cualquier comportamiento indebido que pueda molestar a los vecinos. El propietario se reserva el derecho de llamar a la policía en caso de escándalo y queja de los vecinos. El incumplimiento de estas normas podrá derivar en el desalojo de los huéspedes y cancelación de la reserva sin devolución de dinero alguno. - No se permiten mascotas sin una previa aprobación escrita. - Hay ascensor en el edificio pero no se permite el uso para los viajeros porque es muy antiguo y  da muchos problemas. Estamos en el primer piso y hay muy pocos escalones. Es mejor subir que quedarse atrapado dentro !!! - Por favor, utilice el agua y la electricidad solo cuando lo necesite. Agradecemos que apague luces y aire acondicionado antes de salir de su apartame
fields.description: Este magnífico piso de 3 dormitorios y 3 baños,  recientemente reformado, con capacidad de HASTA 8 PERSONAS, tiene 2 balcones a la calle Estrella y reúne todo el encanto y el confort para hacer de tu visita a Madrid una estancia inolvidable. COSMOS tiene una superficie aproximada de 90 m2 y forma parte de LA CASA DE LUNA.  Cosmos tiene su propia puerta con llave de seguridad para una total privacidad e independencia. Los huéspedes han calificado esta propiedad con 5 estrellas, destacando el trato amable y la comodidad.  La distribución se compone de: - Salón muy luminoso con balcón a calle Estrella. - Barra con 4 taburetes y menaje de mesa.  - 3 Dormitorios, todos con baño y televisión, de los cuales uno es tipo Master Room y otro es tipo estudio. - Dentro de Cosmos, cada dormitorio tiene privacidad y puedes pedir tu propia llave si lo deseas. - Total, 5 camas: 3 dobles y 2 individuales (sofá nido).  - 3 televisores, uno de ellos smart tv con pantalla de 50 pulgadas. - 6 armarios grand
fields.summary: Este magnífico piso de 3 dormitorios y 3 baños,  recientemente reformado, con capacidad de HASTA 8 PERSONAS, tiene 2 balcones a la calle Estrella y reúne todo el encanto y el confort para hacer de tu visita a Madrid una estancia inolvidable.

fields.name: GRAN VÍA COSMOS: IDEAL GRUPOS!!
fields.neighborhood_overview: Junto a Gran Vía, COSMOS está localizado en el punto perfecto para iniciar la visita al Madrid monumental, gastronómico, cultural y nocturno. Quieres descubrirlo?  - VISITA MONUMENTAL: Luna es un excelente punto de partida para visitar el Madrid de los Austrias, la plaza Mayor, la zona de Opera con el Palacio de Oriente, El Retiro... - MUSEOS: Bajando hacia Cibeles por la Gran Vía llegamos al Paseo del Prado, con la mejor oferta de Museos de la Ciudad: Museo Thysen, El Prado, Reina Sofía y CaixaForum son los principales. - QUE HACER: Cosmos está en pleno "soho" madrileño, un barrio con una intensa vida cultural. Teatros, cines, salas de exposiciones, centros de canto, danza, talleres de pintura, salas de conciertos, editoriales, librerías, talleres artesanales, escuelas y centros de diseño... Simplemente paseando te tropezaras con todo un abanico de posibilidades. - DONDE COMER: La zona presenta una rica y variada oferta gastronómica nacional e internacional. Aqui tienes varias propues
fields.notes: - LA CASA DE LUNA dispone de Internet wifi por fibra óptica. - Hay laundry con tabla, plancha, lavadora y secadora, donde encontrará artículos de limpieza como jabón y suavizante para lavadora, lejía, etc que puede utilizar GRATIS en la casa.  - Hay secadores de pelo y expendedores de jabón con gel en los baños. - Se ofrece servicio opcional de limpieza, cambio de sábanas y toallas durante la estancia. Pedir presupuesto. - Hay  extintor de incendios en el vestíbulo de entrada. - Hay costurero y botiquín en el aparador de la entrada. - Hay 3 aparatos de aire acondicionado frío/calor con mando a distancia en soporte mural. - Hay 3 ventiladores con mando a distancia. - Las luces del pasillo y vestíbulo, por ser zonas comunes, se apagan automáticamente. - Cuna: Tarifa plana 20 euros hasta 5 personas. A partir de 6 huéspedes adultos, la cuna cuesta 10 euros por noche.

fields.host_about:
Somos positivos, vitalistas y nuestra finalidad es ser felices.
Procuramos dar armonía a nuestras decoraciones, que tengan vida y no resulten frías, que se integren con el entorno.
Nuestro sueño es conocer el mundo. Por eso respetamos mucho a los viajeros y procuramos tratarles como nos gustaría que lo hicieran con nosotros.
Nos encanta recibir invitados y que se sientan como en su propia casa.

A number of the capital’s top sights and attractions are within easy reach, including the Puerta del Sol, the exciting neighbourhoods of Malasana, Chueca and Cortes, and the beautiful Templo de Debod park. The area immediately surrounding the apartment is filled with great shops, cafes, bars and restaurants, and there are plenty of good transport links nearby.

fields.host_about:
Spain Select was born from the recognition of a desire among travelers to live locally in a real home whilst away from their own, and yet still enjoy all of the benefits and small luxuries of a hotel stay. Not only that, though, we understood that they also wanted to be close to all of the best that their destination has to offer – to be right in the heart of it all. So we decided to source a broad range of high quality homes in the most sought after locations across the country, starting with the capital Madrid and moving over to Malaga, Valencia, and Seville. We then added a few unique flourishes that embody our brand of service and our values. Our interior design team works to extract and enhance the natural charm from each space and make it a warm home. Our very own in-house Local Ambassadors are posted in each destination to welcome each guest home and bed them in to the neighborhood when they first arrive. Finally, a selection of hotel-like services – including a 24-hour concierge for everything from show tickets to new sheets – and a motorized maintenance team completes our comprehensive customer care throughout every single stay. Every Spain Select experience is unique, yet they are all of a consistent high quality no matter when you stay with us. 

Live local, sleep royal: welcome to Spain Select.

fields.description: Contemporary in style, this two-bedroom apartment is the best option for families or a small group of friends looking to discover the charm of the city. With touches of color, design furniture and spacious layout, this apartment is the perfect combination of comfort and elegance. Living/Dining Room & Kitchen: this open-floor plan gathers the living, dining room and kitchen into one combined space. On one end is the fully-equipped modern kitchen with a large island countertop facing the rest of the living area. The living room is placed in the middle, with a two-seater sofa, a coffee table and flat screen tv against the wall. To the left of the living room is an elegant dining room with a wooden table and sitting for four people. This space is carefully tied together with a scheme of neutral colors and subtle pops of color like the geometric rug and the paintings on the walls. Master Bedroom: this room has a double bed framed with a large padded headboard and equipped with luxury linens

fields.description: The only silo-based cottage in New Orleans. It's a cozy, eclectic, and romantic getaway just 10 minutes from the historic French Quarter. The cottage is in a safe, convenient, and quiet neighborhood.  With a fenced in yard, it's pet friendly. There's 1 full size bed in the loft, a kitchenette, bathroom, and table and chairs in the parlor. fields.name: Spain Street Silo
fields.neighborhood_overview: We live in the neighborhood of Gentilly Terrace which was developed in 1909 as a getaway community from the main part of the city. It has been listed on the National Register of Historic Places.  It's unique architecture has a mix of California bungalow, English Tudor,  Spanish and Italian hacienda style homes. The ambiance in the Terrace is a refreshing departure from the din of the city.  Our community is a mixture of cultures and diversity and it is an attractive place for all who call it home. We are centrally located to the New Orleans Fair Grounds ( where the Jazz Fest Happens) ....
fields.notes: We have a fenced in yard and allow up to one small-ish dog. Please keep the gate closed at all times as we have a small chihauhau.

fields.host_about:
My name is Robin and my husband is Bob. We have one furry baby girl named Smidgen (you can see her in the last photo). We are both natives of New Orleans and our neighborhood - Gentilly. I am an RN and teach at a local university. Bob is a IT professional and small business owner. Smidgen is a professional comfort provider (lap dog ) and international cuteness star.  I love making things, sewing, hand embroidering, knitting, crocheting and building silos. Bob is way less complicated. He loves our Saints football team, a glass of chardonnay, Jazz Fest and dining. 
We are very excited to meet new people and expose them our city, our history, our culture, which is unlike anything you seen anywhere else in the world. We are travelers too, and we like the Airbnb experience when we travel so we can experience the community from a local, real and unique perspective that we can call our own.

fields.neighborhood_overview: Located right in the middle of the long pedestrianized street Calle Fuencarral in the neighbourhood of Malasaña, the surrounding area is synonymous with cutting-edge style and fashion. The neighbourhood is bursting at the seams with traditional tabernas, independent boutiques, great restaurants and quirky bars, and is popular with students and young professionals eager to sample the newest and hippest additions to the city. Fuencarral itself is one of the best streets in Madrid for shopping, with a high number of international and local brands running the entire length of the street. Just a ten minute walk south leads visitors to the beautiful art deco avenue the Gran Via, while the surrounding neighbourhoods of Tribunal, Chueca and Justicia offer some of the city’s best dining, nightlife and shopping.

fields.host_about:
Spain Select was born from the recognition of a desire among travelers to live locally in a real home whilst away from their own, and yet still enjoy all of the benefits and small luxuries of a hotel stay. Not only that, though, we understood that they also wanted to be close to all of the best that their destination has to offer – to be right in the heart of it all. So we decided to source a broad range of high quality homes in the most sought after locations across the country, starting with the capital Madrid and moving over to Malaga, Valencia, and Seville. We then added a few unique flourishes that embody our brand of service and our values. Our interior design team works to extract and enhance the natural charm from each space and make it a warm home. Our very own in-house Local Ambassadors are posted in each destination to welcome each guest home and bed them in to the neighborhood when they first arrive. Finally, a selection of hotel-like services – including a 24-hour concierge for everything from show tickets to new sheets – and a motorized maintenance team completes our comprehensive customer care throughout every single stay. Every Spain Select experience is unique, yet they are all of a consistent high quality no matter when you stay with us. 

Live local, sleep royal: welcome to Spain Select.

fields.space: The apartment is ideally situated for guests to enjoy many of Madrid’s top sights and attractions, including the “Big Three” art museums found on the nearby Paseo del Prado, the buzzing Plaza de Santa Ana, and the Puerta del Sol, the very heart and soul of the city. The historical nature of the Barrio de Las Letras makes it one of the best places in Madrid to enjoy an evening tapeoin establishments frequented by writers and artists both past and present. With its luxurious décor and spacious rooms, the apartment itself offers an elegant home in the heart of the city. The highlight of the property is its large open-plan living area, which moves seamlessly from sitting room to dining room and finally onto a modern, fully-equipped kitchen. The two sitting areas are filled with light throughout the day thanks to the exterior-facing balconette windows, and the space has been beautifully decorated in pastel colours and neutral tones. The adjacent kitchen and dining room are contemporary in b
fields.name: Elegance in the heart of Madrid - Lope de Vega III
fields.neighborhood_overview: The surrounding area is known as the Barrio de Las Letras due to the district’s long cultural and literary history – writer Quevedo actually completed many of his masterpieces in this very street. The barrio is a mix of peaceful lanes and more lively pedestrianized streets that are lined with restaurants, cafes and independent boutiques and is the perfect place to indulge in an evening stroll with both residents and other visitors alike.
fields.notes: Please Note: The apartment is located in an area of Madrid with traffic restrictions and is only open to residents, public transport and our airport transfer service.

fields.host_about:
Spain Select was born from the recognition of a desire among travelers to live locally in a real home whilst away from their own, and yet still enjoy all of the benefits and small luxuries of a hotel stay. Not only that, though, we understood that they also wanted to be close to all of the best that their destination has to offer – to be right in the heart of it all. So we decided to source a broad range of high quality homes in the most sought after locations across the country, starting with the capital Madrid and moving over to Malaga, Valencia, and Seville. We then added a few unique flourishes that embody our brand of service and our values. Our interior design team works to extract and enhance the natural charm from each space and make it a warm home. Our very own in-house Local Ambassadors are posted in each destination to welcome each guest home and bed them in to the neighborhood when they first arrive. Finally, a selection of hotel-like services – including a 24-hour concierge for everything from show tickets to new sheets – and a motorized maintenance team completes our comprehensive customer care throughout every single stay. Every Spain Select experience is unique, yet they are all of a consistent high quality no matter when you stay with us. 

Live local, sleep royal: welcome to Spain Select.

Considerable attention was paid to all of its details; the highest quality materials were used; and first class furnishings were carefully selected. The apartment looks onto a small, tree-lined square that reflects the traditional style of the city's historic district, and is perfect for visitors who would like to experience "Old Madrid". There are many traditional cafes and restaurants in this neighbourhood, as well as some trendy new locales.

fields.name: Avant-garde next to the Golden Mile - Serrano III
fields.neighborhood_overview: Situated on what is known as Madrid’s “golden mile” in the exclusive barrio de Salamanca, the apartment is right between the Paseo de Recoletos and Calle Serrano. Calle Serrano is a wide, tree-lined street considered to be Madrid’s equivalent to 5th Avenue. Brimming with designer stores, upmarket boutiques and excellent cafes and restaurants, Serrano and its surrounding streets are home to some of the most exclusive shops and services in the city. The famous Parque del Bueno Retiro is also just a stone’s throw from the apartment and offers a green and tranquil respite from the hustle and bustle of the vibrant Spanish capital. The impressive Plaza de Colon and National Library are located directly opposite the apartment, and the art deco thoroughfare the Gran Via is just a short walk away.
fields.notes: Dependiendo de tu horario de llegada, estableceremos una hora para entregarte las llaves y explicarte lo más importante para que disfrutes del apartamento al 100%. Normalmente será a partir de las 16h, pero intentaremos adaptarnos a ti lo máximo posible. ¡Estamos a tu disposición durante toda tu estancia para lo que necesites!
